entry.data:
SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

RAIN LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
RAIN MAY BE HEAVY AT TIMES IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
RAIN, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 30
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
